en-US.title: Calamity Overhaul Wiki
en-US.welcome: Welcome to the Calamity Overhaul Wiki
en-US.description: This is a database for Calamity Overhaul players and developers, you can query a variety of information about the content of the module here (- the current wiki is not completed, if you find errors or incomplete pages, please forgive me -)
en-US.weapons_desc: Browse all new and modified weapons in the mod.
en-US.changes_desc: Learn about all adjustments and modifications to the vanilla content in the mod.
en-US.enemies_desc: Check out the new and adjusted enemies in the mod.
en-US.footer: Calamity Overhaul Wiki All rights reserved.
